summary: Simple Main Screen Logo Texture Replacer
descriptionHtml:
Simple texture replacement for the main menu loadingscreen logo

- First i made this just for the fun for myself and like to share, this texture replacer doesn\'t change masive the Main menu Logo.

- This is fully compatible with Main Menu Spinning Skyrim Emblem by Brumbek
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7801

- This replacer comes in two metal choices, Old metal and New metal with colored glassy parts in total 6 colors.

- Green
- Blue
- Red
- Pink
- Purple
- bronze

- Best  extracting these files by hand, the folders contains more color options.

- Simple choose the color of your choice and place the texture folder into your Data folder of Skyrim: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data

To uninstall:
Just remove texturefile:  texture/interface/objects/logo02_d.dds from the folder
author: Xazomn
